page.title: About CORE ATHLETE | Elite Athletic Training Philosophy
page.description: Learn about our training philosophy, team, and commitment to building champions through science-based athletic development. Discover what sets CORE ATHLETE apart.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: CORE ATHLETE was founded on a simple belief: every athlete has untapped potential waiting to be discovered. What started as a passion for athletic development has grown into a comprehensive training facility dedicated to transforming athletes across all sports and skill levels.

Our journey began with a commitment to evidence-based training methods and individualized coaching. We've spent years refining our approach, combining cutting-edge sports science with time-tested athletic principles to create programs that deliver real, measurable results.
Today, we're proud to be a trusted partner for athletes seeking to elevate their performance, whether they're preparing for their first competition or pursuing elite-level goals.

items.description: Opportunities for athletes to discover their potential and push beyond perceived limits through structured, science-based training methods.
Building pathways to success through progressive skill development, strategic programming, and supportive coaching environments.
Adjusting mindsets, techniques, and approaches to optimize performance outcomes and break through plateaus.
Setting ambitious yet achievable goals that inspire growth, dedication, and a commitment to excellence.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Expert Coaches Dedicated to Your Success

members.name: Sarah Johnson
members.bio: Former collegiate athlete with 10+ years of experience in strength and conditioning. Certified Performance Enhancement Specialist (PES) and Corrective Exercise Specialist (CES).

members.name: Marcus Williams
members.bio: Track and field background with expertise in sprint mechanics and explosive power development. Specialized in youth athletic development.

members.name: Emily Chen
members.bio: Biomechanics specialist focused on movement efficiency and injury prevention. Works with athletes across multiple sports disciplines.

items.title: NSCA Certified Facility
items.description: Recognized by the National Strength and Conditioning Association

items.title: USA Weightlifting Partner
items.description: Official training partner for Olympic weightlifting development

items.title: SafeSport Certified
items.description: All coaches certified in athlete safety and protection

items.title: Sports Medicine Partnership
items.description: Collaboration with local sports medicine clinic for athlete care

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of athletes who have transformed their performance with CORE ATHLETE.
